author: IGN
description:
Get a deeper look at Into the Fire in this extended gameplay trailer for the upcoming extraction survival game set in the heart of a volcanic disaster. Join the development team to learn more about your mission, gameplay, and world of Into the Fire in this latest trailer. Into the Fire will be available in Early Access on PC via Steam in 2025.

75,000 years ago, it almost wiped out life on Earth. Now, the same demons are stirring from a deep, ancient slumber. And with them begins your battle against hellish powers and the fury of nature during a volcanic eruption. As you race through the chaos, saving people and animals, you'll uncover dark, twisted legends more terrifying than you can imagine. Beneath your feet, an eerie force lurks, breaking every rule of science.
title: Into the Fire - Official Extended Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Suppliers are your gateway to success in Schedule 1. After all, you can’t create complex concoctions without securing the essential ingredient first. In this video, we’ll break down how to unlock each supplier, detail their offerings, and identify the stash locations you’ll need to use until you've earned their trust for direct meet-ups or delivery.

00:00 Intro
00:41 Albert Hoover
01:26 Shirley Watts
02:26 Salvador Moreno
03: 15 Outro
title: Schedule I: How to Unlock All Suppliers | Stash Locations

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Sony is raising the price of select models of the PS5 in several regions, except the U.S. This is likely to counter the expected U.S. tariffs that could his the gaming industry hard in the coming months. The U.S. is the PS5's largest territory and Sony would want to protect the region from rising costs, but that means making up the difference elsewhere. In other news, Call of Duty: Warzone received a shot in the arm as the original Verdansk map has proven to be a hit with fans. The game saw a spike in concurrent players and positive feedback, and Activision has teased more Verdansk-related content in the future. And speaking of shots in the arm, Assassin's Creed Shadows is proving to be the boost that Ubisoft has needed. While it's not the franchise's biggest launch ever, it is currently the second-best-selling game of the year, behind Capcom's Monster Hunter Wilds. The game also saw two million players in its first weekend, and strong reviews from critics and lo
title: Sony Raises PS5 Prices in Several Regions - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Causal Loop in this announcement trailer for the upcoming narrative sci-fi puzzler game. Learn about the story and get a peek at gameplay from Causal Loop, which features an 'Echo Branching' mechanic to record your actions and engage with up to three echoes of your past self. Harness these duplicates to master ancient alien systems that once seemed impossible to navigate. Causal Loop will be available on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG).

What if every decision you made left behind an echo - an imprint of your past actions, repeating endlessly? In Causal Loop, players don’t just solve puzzles - they navigate a fractured reality that is both their greatest tool and their greatest threat. 

In Causal Loop the exo-archaeologist Bale arrives on the long-forgotten alien planet with his colleague Jen, an exo-linguist, to study the ruins of the lost civilization of the Tor – Only to become trapped within a colossal causality loop that fractures reality itself.

With
title: Causal Loop - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
title: How strong are the Switch 2 magnets? #nintendo #switch2 #joycon2 #joycon #magnet #ign #hardware

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at Power Stone and Street Fighter Alpha 3 Upper in this latest Capcom Fighting Collection 2 trailer for the upcoming fighting game compilation. Capcom Fighting Collection 2, featuring 8 iconic fighting games from across Capcom's history, will be available on Nintendo Switch, PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox One, and Steam on May 16, 2025.

In Power Stone, the sky's the limit in this intuitive 3D fighting game. Chuck objects at enemies, launch spin kicks off pillars, fire off bazookas, throw opponents, and more in this bombastic action title! Collect 3 Power Stones that appear on the stage to transform, and seize victory with a mega-powerful Power Drive attack!

Check out the Upper version of the final installment of Street Fighter Alpha 3. Choose your favorite "ism", or fighting style, and get ready to rumble! Play mind games with X-ism, rain down punishing techniques with A-ism, or bamboozle opponents with original V-ism combos—find the style that speaks to you!
title: Capcom Fighting Collection 2 - Official Game Spotlight Trailer #2

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Eternal Strands trailer to see what to expect with the Stargazer free DLC for the action adventure game, which brings a new Epic creature, a new armor set, and new weapon designs developed with Final Fantasy 14's Yusuke Mogi. Eternal Strands: Stargazer will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, the Epic Games Store, and STOVE on April 15, 2025.
title: Eternal Strands: Stargazer - Official Free DLC Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Void Sails gets a new trailer showing gameplay and a release date. Check out the latest Void Sails trailer for this upcoming single-player adventure game where you captain a flying ship across uncharted space. Learn about your mission, get a peek at the world you'll discover, and more in this Void Sails trailer. Void Sails will be available on PC on May 14, 2025.

Sail through mysterious worlds, battle powerful foes, and make story-defining choices in Void Sails. Uncover dark secrets in a game where every discovery could bring you closer to the truth—or to madness.

#VoidSails #Gaming #Games
title: Void Sails - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: A Game Scoop! fan wants to get into Metroid but doesn't know where to start. Metroid Prime? Super Metroid? Let's help him out.
title: How to Get Into the Metroid Franchise - Game Scoop! Clip

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Fortnite: Reload trailer to see the new Slurp Rush map, where fast-paced gameplay is put to the test through the power of healing. The Slurp-packed island features familiar locations inspired by Chapter 2. This new update for Fortnite: Reload also brings a Rank reset.

#Fortnite #Gaming #Games
title: Fortnite Reload: Slurp Rush - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
As part of our IGN First series on The Outer Worlds 2, we talked with design director Matt Singh and lead systems designer Kyle Koenig from Obsidian about how the team expanded the ways in which you can build your character. Instead of the streamlined systems of the first game, The Outer Worlds 2 gives players more room to customize their build for specific playstyles and spec into the game’s unique aspects with reworked RPG elements.
Keep checking back all April long for more exclusive content from The Outer Worlds 2, as it's our IGN First "cover story" for the month!
title: How The Outer Worlds 2 Lets You Go Wild With RPG Character Building – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Darkest Dungeon 2 trailer for the RPG roguelike to see what to expect with the second Kingdoms adventure module, Secrets of the Coven. Darkest Dungeon 2: Secrets of the Coven is available now on PC and Mac. Kingdoms features a completely reimagined game structure and is a parallel game experience to the original Confessions game mode. The Secrets of the Coven adventure module releases alongside community-requested features, including inn storage (Kingdoms only), improved hero path comparisons in both Kingdoms and Confessions modes, new custom difficulty settings, and more.

Something strange is afoot. The unseen threads of witchcraft are at work, pulling at the seams of the Kingdom. Follow clues to uncover and eradicate this mysterious coven before their subversive influence takes root!

#DarkestDungeon #Gaming #Games
title: Darkest Dungeon 2: Secrets of the Coven - Official Kingdoms Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join creator/writer/executive producer Tony Gilroy and stars Diego Luna and Genevieve O'Reilly for a behind-the-scenes look at Season 2 of Andor in this latest video for the Star Wars series. Andor Season 2 stars Diego Luna, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O’Reilly, Denise Gough, Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Alan Tudyk, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, Elizabeth Dulau, with Ben Mendelsohn and Forest Whitaker. The three-episode premiere of Andor season 2 streams on Disney+ on April 22, 2025.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the origin
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official 'Cassian Andor' Behind the Scenes (2025) Diego Luna

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Early Access Launch Trailer for Night is Coming, a horror real-time strategy simulation game developed by Wild Forest Studio. Players will build a settlement, provide defense against enemies, and prepare the town for Darkness in a world set in Slavic mythology. Night is Coming is available now in Steam Early Access for PC.

#NightIsComing #Gaming #IGN
title: Night is Coming - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Long before Bethesda took the reins of the series and Walton Goggins smeared on the ghoul make-up for his spellbinding turn in its adapted TV show, Fallout was an isometric action RPG viewed from a bird’s eye perspective. It’s that classic style of wasteland-wandering that the upcoming Survive the Fall appears to be using as its reference point, at least if the first few hours of the game I got my hands on are anything to go by. This deadly post-apocalyptic tale of survival builds on the original Fallout’s template – quite literally in the case of its robust camp development system – and its squad-based combat and scavenging help it craft an experience that feels fresh, even if the somewhat static story presentation prevents its personality from totally shining through. Previewed by Tristan Ogilvie.
title: Survive the Fall: The First Preview

author: IGN
description:
It's Cristiano Ronaldo vs Salvatore Ganacci in this latest Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves trailer for the upcoming fighting game. Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on April 24, 2025.

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Eddington trailer for this upcoming film starring Joaquin Phoenix, Pedro Pascal, Luke Grimes, Deirdre O'Connell, Micheal Ward, with Austin Butler and Emma Stone. In May of 2020, a standoff between a small-town sheriff (Joaquin Phoenix) and mayor (Pedro Pascal) sparks a powder keg as neighbor is pitted against neighbor in Eddington, New Mexico.

Eddington, directed by Ari Aster, opens in theaters on July 18, 2025.

#Eddington #Movies #Trailer
title: Eddington - Official Trailer (2025) Joaquin Phoenix, Pedro Pascal, Austin Butler, Emma Stone

author: IGN
description:
"You swore," Ellie snarls at Joel in The Last of Us Season 2 trailer. The contention after Joel's decision weighs heavy on the story as we finally head into Season 2, but will Joel and Ellie make it through their turmoil?

IGN's Amelia Emberwing is joined by The Last of Us creators Neil Druckmann and Craig Mazin, as well as cast members Bella Ramsey, Gabriel Luna, Kaitlyn Dever, Isabela Merced and Young Mazino to break down The Last of Us Season 2 premiere and dive into some burning questions that fans have for the rest of the season. But is canon sacred in a story like The Last of Us? The creators/showrunners weigh in on the debate before everything devolves into chaos as everyone breaks down their favorite behind the scenes moments of the season. 
The premiere introduces the television audiences to new infected as the cordyceps continues to wreak havoc, while illustrating a harsh rift between The Last of Us' Joel (Pedro Pascal) and Ellie (Ramsey). We're also introduced to new charac
title: Canon Isn't Sacred: The Last of Us Team Breaks Down the Season 2 Premiere

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy the latest trailer for Prelude Dark Pain, the upcoming dark fantasy open-world tactical RPG with more than 20 playable heroes that features music from composer Kumi Tanioka (Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles, Minecraft).

author: IGN
description:
Check out this The Last of Us Season 2 show vs game comparison! The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 1 has finally arrived on HBO/Max and there are a lot of similarities to be made when comparing the first episode of TLOU TV show to the iconic TLOU2 game, developed by Naughty Dog. Beware of spoilers ahead for The Last of Us series! From snowy patrols, stalkers, and a very important dance - see how close the show's creators got to the original moments in our TLOU S2 Ep 1 comparison.

What did you think of this The Last of Us S2 vs The Last of Us Part 2 comparison? Let us know in the comments!

#TheLastOfUs #TLOU2 #TV
title: The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 1: TV Show vs Game Comparison

author: IGN
description:
Watch our spoiler-filled The Last of Us Season 2 premiere review for TLOU S2 Episode 1 by Simon Cardy. The Last of Us S2 Ep 1 is out now on HBO/Max.

This IGN TLOU Season 2 Episode 1 review is a recap of the first episode of season two of The Last of Us TV show, starring Pedro Pascal as Joel, Bella Ramsey as Ellie, Kaityln Dever as Abby, Isabela Merced as Dina, Young Mazine as Jesse, Ariela Barer as Mel, and Tati Gabrielle as Nora.

#TheLastOfUs #TV #TLOU
title: The Last of Us: Season 2 Premiere Review
